    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>621</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Five Far Away Friends - Quiz 2</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario 2 sobre Five Far away Friends</string>
            <string language="ga">Cúigear Cairde i bhFad ó Bhaile – Tráth na gCeist 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fünf Weit Wegfreunde - Quiz 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cinq Amis Loin Partis - Jeu 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cinco Amigos Distante Ausentes - Quiz 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cinque Amici Lontano Assenti - Quiz 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέντε μακρυά φίλοι - διαγωνισμός γνώσεων 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupils will test their comprehension of chapters 3 and 4 of the book. They will increase their understanding of the the content.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos comprobarán su comprensión del capítulo 3 y 4 del libro. Consolidarán su comprensión del contenido.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfaidh na daltaí a dtuiscint ar chaibidlí 3 agus 4 den leabhar. Méadóidh siad a dtuiscint ar an ábhar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pupillen prüfen ihr Erfassen von Kapiteln 3 
und 4 des Buches. Sie erhöhen ihr Verständnis des Inhalts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles testeront leur compréhension des 
chapitres 3 et 4 du livre. Elles augmenteront leur arrangement 
le du contenu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas testarão sua compreensão dos 
capítulos 3 e 4 do livro. Aumentarão sua compreensão o do 
índice.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille verificheranno la loro comprensione 
dei capitoli 3 e 4 del libro. Aumenteranno la loro comprensione 
del soddisfare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα εξετάσουν την κατανόηση κεφαλαίων τους 3
και 4 του βιβλίου. Θα αυξήσουν την κατανόησή τους του 
περιεχομένου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
